attributes.action: pressure any MP found to have abused the spirit of expenses to resign their seat and therefore prompt a by-election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now the truth about expenses are out the majority of MP are speaking out agains the current scheme, where were these MPs 2-3 years ago, why not raise the issue then. All are sorry, some return money, none face the consequeencies of their actions. Let the electorate/court of public opinion decide. Furthemore where more than 50% resign their seat call an immediate general election.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
